summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for shipping services. It includes information about customs duties and fees associated with a shipment made on August 2, 2002, and provides a breakdown of the total charges incurred.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for FedEx services, indicating his involvement in shipping activities.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned in connection with Jeffrey E. Epstein as a co-shipper on the invoice.

connections.description: Both individuals are listed on the FedEx invoice as involved in the shipping process.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was made by Jeffrey E. Epstein through FedEx, with customs duties and fees detailed in the invoice.

keyFacts: The invoice details a total charge of $200.43 for FedEx services.
The shipment was made on August 2, 2002, and delivered on August 7, 2002.
Customs duties and fees included in the invoice total $200.43.
Ghislaine Maxwell is mentioned as a co-shipper on the invoice.
The document includes a breakdown of charges related to customs and transportation.
